com.novell.ldapchai.util
Class ChaiLogger

java.lang.Object
  com.novell.ldapchai.util.ChaiLogger

public class ChaiLogger
extends Object

Internal Chai API logging wrapper. Users of Chai should ignore this class.

Author:
Jason D. Rivard
